Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene

Class MultiplayerScene

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.BaseScene
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.ChallengeScene
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.MultiplayerScene
public class MultiplayerScene extends ChallengeScene
The MultiplayerScene functions similar to the ChallengeScene but has some slight changes to make it more suitable for multiplayer playing.
